Blog.post: i tink i'm beginning to feel bored abt blog.. lols.. have stop my once a day thing.. become 2 days one time.. heEeheEe.. damm tired sia... sat play soccer.. almost lost the chain darling gave me.. heng i went back 2 find lyk 2hrs+ later n it was still there.. phew~ found le den i take cab home.. cant miss the table tennis matCH! reach home juz in time to watch table tennis.. fark korean lahs.. cb tyco.. see her face i wanna puke le.. from 3-1 up den lose 4-3.. where got such thing sia.. but its over.. nvm.. den watch le went crc meet darling.. play rock fever for the first time in my life.. omg so damm hard.. grRrRr.. den went to eat.. guess where? long john lahs.. dohx.. tapai 1.. lols.. den we went back crc.. i play my mvc2.. she play her rock fever.. den we went home.. weEee.. den i pei darling in irc.. while playing match.. den shogun dulan me.. lovie oso.. lols.. cO.oL.. den oso watch mu match.. omg smith goal was wtf lor.. weEeeE... den 2dae.. play basketball in the morning.. went there 2 play for fun.. end up play 5v5 full court.. omg massive tired.. gotta burn sum FATS.. yEEEHA.. den eat kfc le come back.. nid me borrow coupons from ger summore.. z.Z humji frens.. puI~.. den come back rest awhile den go crc pei darling.. crc lyk our 2nd home le.. lol.. den play rock fever again!! i passed the first 2 stages.. omg wat a achievement... lol.. den play mvc2 oso.. top.. den put my name.. haha.. not onli mine.. i start playing after awhile darling go play rock fever.. she end le i still haven.. lol.. den we went moss burger eat.. eat da nuggets.. den we went walk walk ard finding sex band.. lOL!.. darling lyk attp me.. hmpF~ den take cab.. she oso attp me.. hmpf~.. den send her home le.. i alone on cab.. she send me sms.. sae wanna break.. *piaNgz* my heart shattered.. den suddenly sae she kidding.. wtf >. *LoVe LovEllE*

weeee.. wake up kinda late today.. 11+.. slack ard.. watch tv.. den tried 2 do my blog template nicer but failed.. argh hackx... dis 1 is nice enuff le.. haha.. den afternoon went to ps.. suppose to watch the 3pm show de.. den last min lovie tell me watchin 4:40 1.. wtfish.. but nvm.. there liao can do wat.. after awhile darling come.. den we went arcade.. she underage but they oso dun care de.. she play rock fever.. den i help her whole bag.. >. . *LoVe LovEllE*

yeT anOthEr dAy hAs PassEd... woKe uP aRd 8:15 2Day.. mY dARliNg smS woKe mE uP.. pHew.. iF nt i sUrE slP tiLl miSs LesSonS... heEeheEe.. lEft SchoOl at aRd 8:50.. wAlk AwhiLe reAlisE 4Got tAke tHe 'chAin' mY DarlIng GaVe mE.. buT i LaTe le.. sO cannOt TurN baCKz.. SorRyX.. cAMe bAck dEn sLAcK arD.. deN heLp mY darLinG do Her BloG.. Ai xIn 1 wOr~ ^^ dEN Play aBit oF cS.. deN gaB caLL me Go PlAy sOccEr.. pLay Till leGs SO tiREd.. thE pplE thEre CAll me ZiDanE.. z.Z.. y Not ronAldO siaKz... gRrRrr...cAmE baCk aRd 9 le... dEN chAt in Irc AwhilE.. dEN fElt huNgrY.. weNt doWn buY fooD Up.. omG WAiTed SO FREAKING LONG.. tHe quEuE was liKe WTF lorhss... CamE bACk HomE deN sLack aBit.. PlaY soMe CS.. dEn dO my Blog lOrhz.. jUz StaRteD sO vERi IntEresTed.. aFter a Few wEeKs mAybe Dun caRE le.. hAHaha.. TimE tA slEEp... heEeheEe.. *LoVe LovEllE*

sO tirEd.. bEen TryInG To ADd links/tagboard/pix in2 the bloG... finAlly doNe the LinKz anD tAgbOard.. onLy 1 link thou.. hEh hEh.. ChEeRs! to ShiR foR heLPiNg mE.. gotTa Go schOol LatEr.. gRrRr 9aM.. so EArly... tiMe tA slP.. weEeeEe... -END- *LoVe LovEllE*

YoYOyO... first time playing dis bloggiiie thingy... muakakakka... ydae frens ton my hse.. eat peanuts nv clear.. take out mattress nv keep.. grRrrrRr.. was crapping while watching tv.. fun but man u lost.. z.Z.. den we played sum 'games' using 2 fingers lifting gad up.. lols.. and another game dunno how 2 describe.. even my sis joined in.. lol.. after dat watch vcd.. ard 5+ le.. i watch first 1/2 bth liao den go slp.. weEeE.. wake up ard 11+.. still sleeepy.. but dun care.. den they left ard 12+ cos gab gotta go meet gf.. afternoon do nth.. play sum cs.. mu got bug cannot play... z.Z.. -END- lols.. BonDiDi
